overview: Sakhalin is a distant island. It is swept away by April snowstorms, and if you leave there, then forever. And if you stay, then for good and for great love. Masha turns thirty, and she still hasn't left. And she still hasn't stayed. She can't decide. Or decide.

production_companies.name: M. Razbezhkina and M. Ugarov Academy

title: Here and Now
